author: jnosek1
title: This 5-Minute Core Workout Will Make Your Abs Beg For Mercy
text:
This 5-Minute Core Workout Will Make Your Abs Beg For Mercy Strengthen your core and bulletproof your back with just 2 exercises Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
Trainer: Alexia Clark, personal trainer at Alexia Fitness in Scottsdale, Arizona. 
Benefits: The plank jack and bicycle crunch are both great exercises for your core to begin with. But in this workout, Clark adds a miniband to make the moves even more effective. With the added resistance, youâ€™ll hit your oft-neglected lateral glutes and hip flexors while hammering your core muscles. Advertisement
